title: The Administratrix
description: In the beginning of the much-anticipated third installment of The Office trilogy, young Suzette is at the complete mercy of her new mistress, the sadistic secretary Sasha. But the arrival of a potential investor in Bondage, Inc., Mr. Girard, means Sasha's going to have to share her precious slave for the sake of the company. The two strumpets are forced to entertain Mr. Girard for the weekend, and Suzette soon discovers the depths of her new boss's sexual depravity. For one, Mr. Girard takes Suzette to an exclusive gentleman's club where female guests must disrobe. She doesn't know she's the entertainment until she gets ravished by dozens of faceless sadists. But that's only the beginning... How much of Mr. Girard's cruel degradation can Suzette possibly endure? And if he does become her new boss, what kinds of new humiliations and tortures will he dream up for her? She's almost too excited to wonder....
author: N.T. Morley
